title: tmpltr Configuration
description: Configuration schema for tmpltr - a Typst-based document template engine

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor support

paths.description: Path configuration for templates, schemas, brands, and cache directories

templates_dir.description: Directory containing templates. Supports ~ and environment variables like $XDG_DATA_HOME

schemas_dir.description: Directory containing JSON schemas for content validation. Supports ~ and environment variables

brands_dir.description: Directory containing brand configurations (logos, fonts, colors). Supports ~ and environment variables

cache_dir.description: Cache directory for document index. Supports ~ and environment variables

default.description: Default brand ID to use when --brand is not specified on the command line

binary.description: Path to the typst binary. Leave empty to use PATH lookup

font_paths.description: Additional font paths to search (in addition to system fonts). Supports ~ and environment variables

format.description: Default output format for generated documents

watch_debounce_ms.description: Debounce time in milliseconds for watch mode file change detection

experimental.description: Experimental features (may change or be removed)
